ul.li: OLTP (Online Transaction Processing) = simple CRUD, but large volume
OLAP (Online Analytical Processing) = small volume of complex read-only queries, business intelligence

note.div: Complex benchmarks (TPC-C, TPC-E, TPC-H): principles, metrics

TPC stands for Transaction Processing Performance Benchmark.
TPC-C measures database throughput in transactions per minute (tpmC), also tracks price to performace ratio.
TPC-E measures database throughput in transactions per second (tpsE), also tracks price to performace ratio.
TPC-H is benchmark over database of fixed size. Measures database throughput in queries per hour (QphE@Size), also tracks price to performace ratio.
